citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45pm on July 3,
2025. The inspector arrived at facility and could not find anyone there. The inspector called the licensee and they said
they were away and could not return in time to complete an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals,
and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement
action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45pm on July 3, 
2025. The inspector arrived at facility and could not find anyone there. The inspector called the licensee and they said 
they were away and could not return in time to complete an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, 
and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement 
action. 
 
 
End Section
